panels.title: Committed blocks per sec
panels.description: The rate of the committed round number.

panels.title: Block creation to commit
panels.description: Duration between block generation time until the moment it's committed.

panels.title: Timeout Rounds Rate
panels.description: The total number of rounds that have timeout certificate.

panels.title: Local Timeout rate
panels.description: The total number a single node has timeout locally. When 2f+1 nodes have local timeout for the same round, a timeout round is formed.

panels.title: Error rate
panels.description: The error rate of main loop (timeout is considered as error)

targets.expr: rate(aptos_consensus_error_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval]) / on (kubernetes_pod_name) rate(consensus_duration_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name", op='main_loop'}[$AggInterval])

panels.title: Block execution time [P50]
panels.description: time spent to execute a block

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le)(rate(aptos_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Block execution time [P90]
panels.description: time spent to execute a block

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le)(rate(aptos_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Block execution time [P99]
panels.description: time spent to execute a block

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le) (rate(aptos_executor_execute_block_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Total time to commit blocks [P50]
panels.description: the time spent to commit blocks

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le)(rate(aptos_executor_commit_blocks_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Total time to commit blocks [P90]
panels.description: the time spent to commit blocks

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.9, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le)(rate(aptos_executor_commit_blocks_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Total time to commit blocks [P99]
panels.description: the time spent to commit blocks

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le)(rate(aptos_executor_commit_blocks_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Errors Encountered (Last Hour)
panels.description: This panel tracks the number of errors encountered by the key manager during execution in the last hour. More specifically, we track two error types: (i) liveness errors; and (ii) unexpected errors.

panels.title: No Action Taken (Last Hour)
panels.description: This panel tracks the number of times the key manager decides to take no action after checking the keys because the keys are still fresh (in the last hour).

panels.title: Inbound Connected Peers
panels.description: Total Inbound connected peers.  There should be at most one peer with 0 inbound connections.

panels.title: Outbound Connected Peers
panels.description: Total Outbound connected peers.  There should be at most one peer with 0 Outbound connections.

panels.title: Mempool size
panels.description: total number of transactions in mempool

panels.title: Outgoing Txns Rate (Broadcasted)
panels.description: rate of transactions broadcasted to other peers

panels.title: Error Counts of Queries
panels.description: This panel displays the error counts encountered by safety rules queries within the last aggregation interval.

panels.title: Current Epoch
panels.description: The most recent epoch processed by safety rules

panels.title: Last Voted Round
panels.description: The last round that the validator submitted a vote

panels.title: Preferred Round
panels.description: The highest parent round from any incoming quorum certificate

panels.title: JSON-RPC Request Count
panels.description: RPC endpoint level request count.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, type) (rate(aptos_client_service_rpc_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", type=~"$requesttype", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: JSON-RPC method internal errors
panels.description: Internal error rate, likely a bug if there is data show up.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, method, errorcode) (rate(aptos_client_service_internal_error_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", type=~"$requesttype", method=~"$method", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: JSON-RPC method invalid requests
panels.description: The rate of invalid requests, all client side errors.

targets.expr: sum by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, method, errortype) (rate(aptos_client_service_invalid_requests_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", type=~"$requesttype", method=~"$method", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval]))

panels.title: JSON-RPC Request Latency [P50]
panels.description:
This latency is recorded at JSON-RPC handler level without knowing what method is called. There are 2 types, batch and single requests.  
Batch request is total time for all methods call finished.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum  by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le)(rate(aptos_client_service_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",type=~"$requesttype"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: JSON-RPC Request Latency [P90]
panels.description:
This latency is recorded at JSON-RPC handler level without knowing what method is called. There are 2 types, batch and single requests.  
Batch request is total time for all methods call finished.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.90, sum  by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le)(rate(aptos_client_service_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",type=~"$requesttype"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: JSON-RPC Request Latency [P99]
panels.description:
This latency is recorded at JSON-RPC handler level without knowing what method is called. There are 2 types, batch and single requests.  
Batch request is total time for all methods call finished.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum  by (kubernetes_pod_name, role, le)(rate(aptos_client_service_rpc_request_latency_seconds_bucket{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name",type=~"$requesttype"}[$AggInterval])))

panels.title: Logging Rate ($AggInterval) [$kubernetes_pod_name-$role]
panels.description: The rate of logs written via the code.  This is a superset of logs written through to the end log storage system.

panels.title: Logging Total Failure Rate ($AggInterval) [$kubernetes_pod_name-$role]
panels.description: The end to end rate of logs being submitted, to actually being sent to Logstash.  If this value rises above 0, see the corresponding error graphs to determine the issue.

panels.title: Connect Error Rate  ($AggInterval) [$kubernetes_pod_name-$role]
panels.description: Percentage of connections that fail to connect to the logging pod.  Extended or high percentage e.g. 100% connections points to a dead logging pod.

targets.expr: (rate(aptos_struct_log_connect_error_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval]) or 0 * rate(aptos_struct_log_tcp_connect_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])) / rate(aptos_struct_log_tcp_connect_count{chain_name=~"$chain_name", namespace=~"$namespace", role=~"$role", kubernetes_pod_name=~"$kubernetes_pod_name"}[$AggInterval])

list.name: method
list.query: submit, get_account, get_account_transaction, get_account_transactions, get_transactions, get_events, get_metadata, get_currencies, get_state_proof, get_account_state_with_proof
list.label: JSON-RPC Method
